title: Workshop: Building a Digital Exhibit
text:
This tutorial will guide you through the process of publishing a digital exhibit using CollectionBuilder, a popular tool designed and maintained by librarians at the University of Idaho.
To achieve this, we will be using three main tools:

title: Workshop: Building a Digital Exhibit
text:
Prerequisites
To follow along with this tutorial, you will need:

Access to your UCSB Google account to use Google Sheets.
A GitHub account to manage your CollectionBuilder project.
